channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:21 Air alert in Zhytomyr Oblast. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 22:21 Air alert in Zhytomyr Oblast. Stay tuned for further reports. #Zhytomyr_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 20:09 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 20:09 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Go to shelter! #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
